alert.note: Alert for Southwest Wyoming (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 05 at 3:08AM MDT until November 06 at 6:00AM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM MDT THIS MORNING TO 5 AM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 2 to 5 inches with locally higher amounts near the north slopes. Winds gusting as high as 55 mph. * WHERE...Southwest Wyoming. * WHEN...From 6 AM MDT this morning to 5 AM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Winter driving conditions can be expected. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Gusty winds are expected to result in reduced visibilities in blowing and drifting snow Saturday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. For winter road conditions from the Wyoming Department of Transportation, visit http://www.wyoroad.info or dial 511.
